title: What are some good recent PC games
body:
bonus points if it's on **-nope-**

pls nothing 2d, roguelike. shoot em up etc crap like that. the market is so oversaturated with that shit. or turn based. i'm on my damn pc for a reason if i wanted to play a turn based game i'd go damn play checkers or something

(recent as in say like within the 6 months, year or so)
